response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds immense value for me, but I understand its true worth lies in its utility to you. Given its significance, I am offering it to you at a special price of $9,500. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price slightly above its intrinsic value to you. I believe this is a fair deal that respects both the product's worth and your budget. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am looking forward to the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 9500}
